name: The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna
name_original: The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna
description:
The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna is a puzzle game developed by Croteam. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Devolver Digital. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna is available on PC.
